mapper.insert:
select edu_seq.nextval from dual
insert into tbl_education (EDU_SEQ, EDU_TYPE, EDU_NAME, PERIOD_STDT, PERIOD_ENDT, UNIV_TYPE, UNIV_SCORE, UNIV_MAJOR, REF_RESUMESEQ) values (#{eduSeq}, #{eduType}, #{eduName}, #{periodStdt}, #{periodEndt}, #{univType}, #{univScore}, #{univMajor} , #{refResumeseq} )
